column2: Further, when PW 2 asked them not to assault so severely, the 1st accused

column1: appellant has attacked him with a “Manne knife”  saying he (PW 2) was warned
not to interfere. PW 2 has clearly testified that the  1st   accused Liyakan and  3rd
accused Hariz were carrying knives and the others were possessed with  clubs at

column2: රිස්ි  තම්ිර්  ලියාකාන්,  න්ුට, රිස්වාන්, ලියාකාන්,  ලියාකාන්ගේ  ල්ී  න්ුට ඒ
ගගාල්ගලෝ ගහ ගහ  සිටියා. ලියාකාන්ගේ හා හරාරීස්ගග අගත්  ාළු කපන  න්නයක්
